name: Operator decleration - As the operator, I declare that I have been trained in the safe use of this machine, hold appropriate qualification to operate and have been VOC'ed
Undertake Visual Inspection of each of the below
Operator to check each item below & acknowledge checks have been made
Any issues/observations please add comments & photos below
Check cooling water levels and replenish if required - Attach photo below
Check water separator in fuel line and drain if required - Attach photo below
Engine oil level checked and at appropriate levels
Hydraulic oil level checked and at appropriate levels
Battery water levels checked and at appropriate levels
Track tension checked and adjusted if required
No sign of any fuel, oil or hydraulic leaks
Electrical system checked and all lamps in cab light up
Exterior checked and in good condition
Attachments checked and are in acceptable condition, including breaker & buckets - Attach photo below
Interior clean & tidy - Attach photo below
Are there any faults to be identified (Pass-No/Fail-Yes)
Please detail identified fault(s) below - Attach Photos
Who has the fault been reported to - At a minimum, must be reported to your Site Forman
Attachments buckets & breaker in a secure location on completion of days work - Attach photo below
